title: BC问题
txt_content:
显示图片




K~F1BD@V]Z`B1JK[FP~X$QR.png (11.81 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2016-7-26 17:44 上传




，真是奇怪了，我明明弄了服务器的图标

replies.txt_content:
标题: BC问题BC服务器端，开启之后，客户端一进，BC就卡了，而且分服的后台任何没提示BC后台的日记（我不太确定是不是，看起来应该就是日记log)
17:46:57 [信息] Unable to initialize fancy terminal. To fix this on Windows, install the correct Microsoft Visual C++ 2008 Runtime17:46:57 [信息] NOTE: This error is non crucial, and BungeeCord will still function correctly! Do not bug the author about it unless you are still unable to get it working

replies.author: Ling_Haner
replies.txt_content: 你bc服的AnimatedMOTD插件报错了,请先尝试删除该插件然后运行bc试试!

等一下，log我还没发我
补17:47:00 [信息] Listening on /0.0.0.0:2556517:51:06 [严重] ???? 26, 2016 5:51:06 ???? io.netty.channel.ChannelInitializer channelRegistered
